text: A Tiger's Milk bar. Tiger's Milk is a nutrition bar created and introduced in the 1960s by Plus Products owned by James and Arthur Ingoldsby. It was later acquired by Weider Nutrition in the 1980s. The brand is currently owned by Schiff Nutrition International. In 2007, Tiger's Milk was named by the editors of American Way magazine as one of only six "Most Edible" energy bars (of 30 taste-tested). ==References== Category:Brand name snack foods Category:Energy food products Category:Dietary supplements
title: Tiger's Milk
